properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 19.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ
IN AREA WITHIN ONE MILE OF
60-34.00N 028-42.00W AT 010505Z NOV.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 4434 4382 0028, 44 344 382 0025,
FAX: 4413 2924 4547,
E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
